title: Exhibitions for the Winter 1884-1885: December, 1885. A Collection of Oil Paintings; 60 Original Designs for the Century Magazine; Collections of Valuable Engravings belonging to Mr. Jos. M. Rogers; Autotypes lent by St. Louis Museum of Fine Arts. January, 1885. Thompson's important Salon Picture, “Un calvaire-moutons”, sent to the Art Institute from Paris; Selection of Pictures from the Philadelphia Academy; Prang's Prize Christmas Drawings; Exhibition of the Western Art Association. February, 1885. Annual Reception and Loan Exhibition of the Institute

input: Exhibitions for the Winter 1884-1885: December, 1885. A Collection of Oil Paintings; 60 Original Designs for the Century Magazine; Collections of Valuable Engravings belonging to Mr. Jos. M. Rogers; Autotypes lent by St. Louis Museum of Fine Arts. January, 1885. Thompson's important Salon Picture, “Un calvaire-moutons”, sent to the Art Institute from Paris; Selection of Pictures from the Philadelphia Academy; Prang's Prize Christmas Drawings; Exhibition of the Western Art Association. February, 1885. Annual Reception and Loan Exhibition of the Institute
